{
"resourceType" : "CapabilityStatement",
"name" : "ACME_EHR",
"title" : "SystemX",
"status" : "active",
"instantiates" : [
"http://ihe.net/CapabilityStatement/Actor_1",
"http://ihe.net/CapabilityStatement/Actor_2"
],
...
}
